title: First Impressions of iPad Pro+Apple Pencil
description: Here are some quick thoughts on using the new #ipadpro #applepencil with #procreateapp. After some minor tweaking of a preloaded pencil, I found the sweet spot. Love how the Pencil behaves like a pencil

asset.author: robSketcherman
asset.description: Here are some quick thoughts on using the new #ipadpro #applepencil with #procreateapp. After some minor tweaking of a preloaded pencil, I found the sweet spot. Love how the Pencil behaves like a pencil😃. I'll write a full review ASAP with more details.
